item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A ChatGPT clone, in 3000 bytes of C, backed by GPT-2 (2023) (94 points | 19 comments)
2. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (554 points | 191 comments)
3. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (281 points | 433 comments)
4. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (712 points | 361 comments)
5. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (100 points | 16 comments)
6. The Cold Email Handbook (172 points | 73 comments)
7. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (167 points | 34 comments)
8. Review of Mullvad VPN (307 points | 96 comments)
9. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (356 points | 128 comments)
10. Canada euthanasia now accounts for nearly one in 20 deaths (24 points | 7 comments)
11. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (208 points | 249 comments)
12. Tricking c64 basic into clearing a hi-res screen quickly (22 points | 5 comments)
13. Deciphering C++ compiler errors: Nonsensical errors from a function declaration (15 points | 8 comments)
14. Instant macOS install on Proxmox including AMD patches (122 points | 40 comments)
15. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (199 points | 37 comments)
16. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (100 points | 61 comments)
17. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (307 points | 186 comments)
18. The GPU is not always faster (139 points | 71 comments)
19. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (128 points | 64 comments)
20. A letter to open-source maintainers (121 points | 31 comments)
21. WXT: Next-Gen Web Extension Framework (15 points | 2 comments)
22. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (139 points | 72 comments)
23. The Myth of Bananaland (121 points | 91 comments)
24. Dear OAuth Providers (210 points | 45 comments)
25. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (215 points | 88 comments)
26. Reachability Analysis of DNS (5 points | discuss)
27. Majora's Mask decompilation project reaches 100% completion (44 points | 5 comments)
28. Django and Postgres for the Busy Rails Developer (153 points | 79 comments)
29. Storing Times for Human Events (104 points | 40 comments)
30. Melons and Melancholy: Review of Steven Shapin's "Eating and Being" (3 points | discuss)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
